name: Rotation baking/worst game
description:
Worst game don't play

Created by my little brother for the mini jam 94

/Controls/

Left arrow key to move right yeah

Left mouse click to place a rotation block

/Objective/

To get the not cute chef to the table to bake eggs

Use the rotation block to navigate him so if he goes right and when touches it he goes up //I don't know if it works

/There is only 2 levels/

Maybe one day I will fix this scuffed game
